title: Within a mile o' Edinburgh Town
author: Hardy, Robina F.
snippet: " While Jean was thus counselled and warned, comforted and reproved, Lizzie Fairlie was wandering away among the woods or along the high-road, with no sign of success as yet. At the turn of Liberton Road she met a familiar form. A woman, carrying a market basket and apparently a good deal tired with her walk, stopped right in front of her.
